      • condition

        public LootTableBuilder.Pool condition​(net.minecraft.util.Identifier id,
                                       Processor<JsonObjectBuilder> settings)
        Add a condition to this pool. All conditions must pass for the pool to be used. The specific properties of this vary by condition, so this falls through to direct JSON building.
        Parameters:
        id - The condition ID.
        settings - A callback which will be passed a JsonObjectBuilder.
        Returns:
        this
        See Also:
        Minecraft Wiki
